tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE market_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE news_data (
  news_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  news_title VARCHAR(255),
  news_date DATE,
  news_source VARCHAR(100),
  news_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_exposure (
    exposure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    news_id INT,
    risk_level VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES market_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (news_id) REFERENCES news_data(news_id)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  news_id INT NOT NULL,
  risk_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES market_events(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (news_id) REFERENCES news_data(news_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_date DATE,
  assessment_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES risk_assessment(assessment_id)
);
